background_darkPatternDetectionText.message: Starting detection of dark patterns in the cookie notice.

background_doubleInteractionText.message: Starting interaction with a nested button: $text1$ > $text2$

background_downloadingModelsText.message: Starting download of AI models for the analysis of the cookie notice. If the extension has not been used recently, this may take some time. You can follow the progress in the popup on the top right.

background_ieErrorText.message: The interaction with the button did not work. We are skipping it.

background_ieSuccessText.message: The interaction with the button was successful. Starting interaction with webpage (scrolling and clicking on links).

background_interactWoBannerText.message: Starting interaction with the website (scrolling and clicking on links), while ignoring the cookie banner.

background_startingClassificationText.message: The download has finished. The analysis of the cookie banner starts now.

popup_initialInstruction.message: Open the target website and close all other tabs and browser windows before starting a scan.

popup_skipSelection.message: Please select the cookie notice. If there is no notice, skip the selection below.

popup_tooManyTabsText.message: More than one tab is open. Please close the other tabs.

popup_tooManyWindowsText.message: More than one window of this browser is open. Please close the other windows.

selector_querySelectorTimeoutText.message: Please report this website and the following error to the CookieAudit team: Timeout while finding querySelectors.

selector_selectNewNoticeText.message: Please select the new cookie notice that contains the settings. Selection begins after this notice disappears.

selector_selectNoticeText.message: Please select the cookie notice. Selection begins after this notice disappears. If there is no cookie banner, skip the selection in the popup on the top right.
